summary: This is an email chain from December 10, 2018, between law enforcement officials discussing investigative steps regarding Jeffrey Epstein. The emails focus on obtaining records related to 911 calls and phone number searches, and reference coordination for an upcoming event on Wednesday.

persons.name: N. (NY) (FBI)
persons.context: An FBI agent in New York who is copied on emails regarding the Epstein investigation and is part of the coordination for obtaining records.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central subject of the investigation, whose phone number is mentioned as a target for a DAS search in the email chain.

connections.description: Communicating via email to coordinate investigative steps, such as obtaining 911 call reports and phone number searches related to Epstein.
The FBI agent is involved in an investigation targeting Jeffrey Epstein, as indicated by the discussion of searching his phone number.

events.title: Email Coordination on Epstein Investigation
events.description: Law enforcement officials exchange emails to coordinate obtaining 911 call reports and conducting a DAS search on Epstein's phone number, and schedule a call to discuss items in preparation for an upcoming Wednesday event.

events.title: Upcoming Wednesday Event
events.description: Referenced as a date for which preparation is needed, though the specific nature of the event is not detailed in the text.

keyFacts: Law enforcement was actively investigating Jeffrey Epstein as of December 2018, seeking 911 call reports and phone record searches.
The email chain indicates coordination between the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
An upcoming event on Wednesday, December 12, 2018, is referenced as a point requiring preparation, suggesting ongoing legal or investigative proceedings.
